Lafayette.Trinity United Methodist Church (Lafayet:
Trinity United Methodist Church has been a part of the Lafayette, Indiana area since 1824, before the city was founded. The first meetings were held in the old log courthouse; the church was formally organized in 1827 with 10 members. Trinity United Methodist is located at: 314 North Sixth St, Lafayette, IN 47901


== History ==
In 1830, the first church building was built on Sixth Street for $1,500.
